questions.question: Put the following quote in order from Chapter one

choices.answer: So you live day to day
and hope you don't get sick.
<sub>Your life is the hook you carry, there in your hand,</sub>
turning the trash.

questions.question: Put the following quote in order:

choices.answer: Everyone needs a key.
With the right key,
you can bust the door wide open.
Because nobody's going to open it for you.

questions.question: Put the following quote in order:

choices.answer: I was a trash boy since I was old enough
to move without help and pick things up.
That was what?
- three years old, and I was sorting.

questions.question: Put the following quote in order:

choices.answer: <sub>Jose Angelico had died in a police station, they said,</sub>
and that's why I stuck to the lie,
even as they held me out of that window-
<sub>for the sake of Jose Ang'co & his serious-faced little girl.</sub>

questions.question: Put the following quote in order  from Sr Olivia:

choices.answer: These children are doomed
to breathe the stink all day, all night,
sifting the effluent of the city.
Rats and children, children and rats

questions.question: Put the following quote in order:

choices.answer: Behala is a huge monstrous, filthy, steaming rubbish dump
& you cannot believe human beings are allowed to work there,
let alone live there. Rubbish and shacks-
its extreme,its horrible & I will never forget the stink.

questions.question: Put the following quote in order:

choices.answer: but no schools or hospitals were ever built
and the city stayed poor
Senator Zapanta stole it
and I tried to prove he stole it

questions.question: Put the following quote in order from Gardo:

choices.answer: So we did not want anyone to know anything.
Please forgive me for that,
and I hope I see you again sometime.
I am sorry how it ended for you.

questions.question: Put the following quote by Gabriel Olondriz in order:

choices.answer: The Senator was smart.
I was stupid.
In this country, you pay for being stupid,
just as you pay for being poor.

questions.question: Put the following quote from the gardener in order:

choices.answer: because I believe that s.o.b. in there's
been stealing for years.
Stealing even from me and you-
can you believe that?

questions.question: Put the following quote in order from Gardo discussing Marco and the Bible:

choices.answer: 'He will want money,' said Gardo softly.
'I think he will want a lot of money, but he will bring it.
This is very dangerous now, for you also.
He could betray us.'

questions.question: Put the following quote in order from Rat:

choices.answer: <sub>It would be robbing from your own people</sub>
which is why I felt so low.
<sub>I was about to thieve not just from the Behala people...</sub>
<sub>but from Fr J who'd been about the closest thing to a father</sub>
